messages.content: First of all I should apologise that we are now facing another election. However, it should be noted that whilst none of us actually relish seven weeks of TV and radio coverage of the election I do firmly believe that the Prime Minister has made the correct decision.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need to have a strong and stable Government to take us through the negotiating period and more importantly to be able to implement changes without constantly being expected to dance to the tune of others.

mentions.candidate: I am asking you to consider supporting me either again or for the first time.

issues.brexitEurope: We are embarking on a major change and the Prime Minister has been steadfast in her view that we need to implement the decision made by the people of Wales and the people of the UK to leave the European Union in a manner that brings people together rather than tear them apart.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have attempted to be approachable and available in the Constituency since I was first elected in 2010 and in Westminster I have served as a Government Whip and Wales Office Minister since 2016.

politicalExperience.role: Government Whip and Wales Office Minister

contactInformation.address: 1 Ashdown House, Riverside Business Park, Conwy, LL32 8UB
